name: Embric
tagline: An ember-cli add-on that provides a fabric.js canvas with editor controls.
body:
### [fabric.js](http://fabricjs.com) + [ember](http://emberjs.com)
Embric is an ember-cli add-on that wraps **fabric.js**, and provides a framework for creating editor widgets editable art in browser apps.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
